channel.title: NPC Freezes
channel.description:
SOLVED
Hey guys got a small bug and just would like to know which files would be the cause of this bug.
I talk to an npc like a shopkeeper, they say hello blah blah, and then it freezes and I don't get the two options on the top left of the screen. If I click off then the game unfreezes.
Just want an idea of where to look as to fix this bug. Thanks.

item.title: NPC Freezes
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“Vibes, post:3, topic:478100”]you might want to look to see in npc loc and see shops.xml.

first see if the shop even exists in shops.xml, if not create it and make sure the npcs match the coords in npc loc and shop.xml[/quote]
Wrong. He’s using rsca, the menu handlers on the client are borked

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Freezes
item.dc:creator: @Vibes Vibes
item.description:
@Vibes wrote:

you might want to look to see in npc loc and see shops.xml.

first see if the shop even exists in shops.xml, if not create it and make sure the npcs match the coords in npc loc and shop.xml

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Freezes
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

Replace the menu handler client side

Read full topic
